info.name: Games On  Net (Kinky's Version)
info.description:
Slim-lined and easy to navigate version of iinet's games.on.net forums. 
The other two didn't work for me so i made my own.
Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo:
Optional Addons:
100% / Wide Version - http://userstyles.org/styles/77621/games-on-net-100-kinky-s-addon
Rollovers / Minimal Homepage - http://userstyles.org/styles/77622/games-on-net-rollovers-kinky-s-addon
Show News - http://userstyles.org/styles/77623/games-on-net-show-news-kinky-s-addon

---

02/11/12 - v2.2
- Optional CSS changed to optional addons (additional stylesheets)
- Dark background

01/11/12 - v2.1
- You can now choose to show the latest news
- You can now see "post tools"

01/11/12 - v2.0 
- Fixed navigation bug in chrome
- Made changes to the userbar (tabs no longer pills)
- Removed useless h2, modified breadcrumbs
- Remodeled the topic list
  - You can now easily identify new topics, unread topics, moved topics etc.
- Made some buttons easier to use (mark read, return to)
- There is an option to have a minimal forum where you need to hover over 
  the forum list to show subforums. Disabled by default but you can just
  un-comment the styles down the bottom and that'll do it.

21/08/12 - v1.0 
- Initial commit
